entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo #59555
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #59554
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_dapper, fortunes_dapper #59553
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, multiple_queries, single_query #59552
  • Error after update to 17.12.3 #59550
  • Getting Error In The Time Of Build Application #59549
  • Null reference exception when ASP .NET Core application is deployed to IIS #59547
  • How to make Blazor Server SignalR connection use a different URL? #59546
  • Missing 'value' attribute on native <input> tag when using 'InputDate' component #59541
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #59540
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef, multiple_queries #59539
  • possible memleak in internal CertificateManager #59538
  • Redundant checks in ResponseCachingKeyProvider #59537
  • Execption thrown when generating OpenAPI document using F# #59536

Closed

  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi. How can I detect when dotnet watch has hot reloaded? #59258
  • OpenApi will use System.ComponentModel.Attributes changed to Fluent mode. #59393
  • FromQueryAttribute fails to deserialize complex object if object is the same name as a containing property #59527
  • OpenIdConnectAuthenticationHandler: message.State is null or empty #55910
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #59530
  • Blazor WASM initial download timeout/retry #59522
  • Minimal API inconsistent results for 403 status code #59391
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, json #59519
  • Perf regression: json_middleware #59520
  • OpenAPI generation leads to invalid openapi.json file #59496
  • .NET 9 - OpenAPI Not Generating Output #58805
  • ASP.NET Core 9.0: Swagger UI when returning async TypedResults shows Void under the schema #59324

PullRequests

Created

  • Add AuthN/AuthZ metrics #59557
    area-security
  • Fixed ownership mapping for the routing area #59556
    area-infrastructure
  • Use the live crossgen2 corresponding to the runtime we're building against #59551
    area-infrastructure
  • Removed unused areas #59548
    area-infrastructure
  • Fixed Bug 59396 for Camel/Compliant casing. #59545
    community-contribution, pr: pending author input, area-networking
  • Redis distributed cache: add HybridCache usage signal #59543
    area-middleware
  • Only generate specified document (#59097) #59535
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, feature-openapi
  • [release/9.0] Don't throw exception for parameters with custom binding source #59533
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc, feature-openapi, 9.0.x

Updated

  • Adds the ability to specify an appsettings file for user-jwts #58605
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution
  • Update testing analyzers #59516
    area-infrastructure
  • Correct typo in ProtectedPersonalDataAttribute.cs & PersonalDataAttribute.cs #58664
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT] perf: improve ManagedAuthenticatedEncryptor Decrypt() and Encrypt() flow #59424
    area-dataprotection
  • ALWAYS include the Vary Accept-Encoding header when response compression is enabled #55092
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Set IExceptionHandlerFeature on DeveloperExceptionPageMiddleware #52688
    feature-diagnostics, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • [release/9.0] Fix MultipartReaderStream synchronous read when using buffer offset #59422
    Servicing-approved, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0] Fix loading dotnet user-jwts config #59473
    Servicing-approved, area-commandlinetools, 9.0.x
  • Retry `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Core.Tests.Http2ConnectionTests.AbortSendsFinalGOAWAY` #59359
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
